cachingSystem.classes

Class TimeAwareCache<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • cachingSystem.classes.ObservableCache<K,V>
      • cachingSystem.classes.LRUCache<K,V>
        • cachingSystem.classes.TimeAwareCache<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache<K,V>

    public class TimeAwareCache<K,V>
extends LRUCache<K,V>
    The TimeAwareCache offers the same functionality as the LRUCache, but also stores a timestamp for each element. The timestamp is updated after each get / put operation for a key. This functionality allows for time based cache stale policies (e.g. removing entries that are older than 1 second).

      • get

        public V get(K key)
        Functie ce returneaza cotinutul fisierului dorit. Daca acest fisier exista in cache, i se va actualiza timestamp-ul si se va apela functia get din LRUCache.
        Specified by:
        get in interface Cache<K,V>
        Overrides:
        get in class LRUCache<K,V>
        Parameters:
        key - Adresa fisierului pe care dorim sa il cautam.
        Returns:
        Continutul fisierului dorit.

        Functie ce va adauga/suprascrie continutul unui fisier dorit si va actualiza timestamp-ul acelui fisier in cazul in care este sau nu existent in cache.

      • getTimestampOfKey

        public java.sql.Timestamp getTimestampOfKey(K key)
        Get the timestamp associated with a key, or null if the key is not stored in the cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the timestamp, or null

      • setExpirePolicy

        public void setExpirePolicy(long millisToExpire)
        Set a cache stale policy that should remove all elements older than @millisToExpire milliseconds. This is a convenience method for setting a time based policy for the cache.
        Parameters:
        millisToExpire - the expiration time, in milliseconds
